# Threat-Events™ UX/UI Control

In this section of the Appdome knowledge base, learn to use Appdome's Threat-Events™, Appdome's cyber and fraud UX/UI control framework, for Android & iOS apps. Empower mobile developers, anti-fraud and business teams with granular, real-time, cyber and fraud attack and threat intelligence in Android & iOS apps, as well as total control over the user experience when attacks happen. This section covers using Threat-Events™ UX/UI Control with mobile applications built in specific languages. For protection-specific Threat-Event implementation guides, please see the the knowledge base article associated with that protection.
